title: all: tests don't like multiple cpu values
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Run "go test -short -cpu 1,1"

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Expected:
similar output as go test -short

Observed:
failures in expvar, flag, net/http, net/smtp, os/exec stuck (killed manually).

Test output attached.
Attachments: 1. test11.log (168988 bytes)
